author: October 5, 2015
title: Lenovo unleashes top performance with the E31 Notebook and S500 Desktop
text:
October 5, 2015 Lenovo recently launched the Lenovo E31 and the Lenovo S500 Small Form Factor (SFF) Desktop. This marks the culmination of Lenovoâ€™s continuous efforts of providing high quality devices at an affordable price.
Designed for professionals who are always on-the-go, both products give users the power to be productive and entertained at the same time with its superb features and specs.
The Lenovo E31 is a sleek and stylish notebook that is 25.5mm (.8 in) thick and weighs only 1.59 kg (3.51 lbs), making it a perfect travel companion. It is equipped with a high-performing Intel processor that takes computing up a notch and is packed with up to the 5th Generation Intel processor that and Windows 8.1 Operating System, so users can personalize their Start screen with Live Tiles for easier access to favorite applications, sites and photos. It also features the award-winning, full-sized and island-style AccuType keyboard, which is ergonomically designed for additional comfort for users and ensures maximum typing accuracy.
The Lenovo E31 is packed with features that will not only help users work hard but also play hard. Users can experience maximum viewing enjoyment with its 13-inch (1920 x 1080) full high-definition (HD) display. With anti-glare properties, the screen delivers high quality, vibrant images and crisp text for watching HD movies and graphic-intensive games. It also features a 180-degree hinge for easy screen sharing.
The sleek and trendy Lenovo S500 SFF Desktop is perfect for small and medium-sized businesses that are looking for a compact, affordable solution that does not compromise on performance and offers easy connectivity. It also has powerful security features to control access, safely store and remove data, and transfer data securely via USB. It even locks automatically when the user steps away.
The Lenovo S500 SFF Desktop is 26% smaller than other Small Form Factor models but even with its compact size, it is big on performance. It is powered by 4th generation Intel Core processor up to i7 and runs on Windows 10 which is the best combination for Windows, along with lots of great improvements such as SSD storage technology that boost start-up times and delivers fast response times when using multiple applications. The S500 SFF also has a new technology called InstantGo that allows quick boot up and resume.
